players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Since Alice was killed last night, we know the mafia is among us. Bob has been silent so far—Bob, do you have any thoughts or suspicions to share?"
Diana: "Bob is the mafia—I investigated him last night. We need to vote him out today before he kills again."
Charlie: "Thank you, Diana, for sharing your investigation. Bob, can you explain why you stayed silent? Your response will help us decide if we can trust you or if we need to vote you out."
Diana: "Bob's silence feels suspicious, especially after being accused. If he's innocent, he should defend himself now. Let's vote to arrest Bob and protect the town."
